issue.title: [Python] ChunkedArray.__getitem__ doesn't work with numpy scalars
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9879](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9879). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
 

{{import pyarrow as pa
import numpy as np
pa.chunked_array(pa.array([1,2]))[np.int32(0)]}}

fails with error `TypeError: key must either be a slice or integer`.
